description:
Rugged but featherweight boots for light-and-fast alpine missions. Inspired by the boundary-pushing mountaineer Ueli Steck, the innovative Ribelle Tech is an ultralight hybrid boot for alpinists or mountain guides who prize precision and lightness for a straight shot from valley floor to summit. Combining elements of trail running and mountaineering footwear, it offers incredible agility, control and grip along with big-day comfort.

  • Integrated Sock-Fit Plus gaiters and tongue are tough, Kevlar-reinforced S-Tech fabric
  • Upper is durable Microtech synthetic leather
  • HDry® waterproof-breathable membrane
  • Quick-lace system can be operated with cold or gloved fingers
  • Pro Fiber insole is made of fibreglass and polypropylene for cushioned control
  • Lightweight midsole has a medium density polyurethane heel and medial vertical grooves for cushion and support
  • Vibram® Precision Tech outsole with Vibram Mont rubber compound for support and durability in extremely low temperatures
  • Compatible with hybrid crampon binding systems
name: Scarpa Ribelle HD Mountaineering Boots - Men's
